verses.name: Ezekiel 30:13
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord God; I will also destroy the idols, and I will cause their images to cease out of Noph; and there shall be no more a prince of the land of Egypt: and I will put a fear in the land of Egypt.

verses.name: Ezekiel 30:14
verses.text: And I will make Pathros desolate, and will set fire in Zoan, and will execute judgments in No.

verses.name: Ezekiel 30:15
verses.text: And I will pour my fury upon Sin, the strength of Egypt; and I will cut off the multitude of No.
